name: LTC experience study
description: Genie room for LTC experience study on incidence and claim termination
instructions: * Unless specified, use incurred age for age, total exposure for exposure, total claim count for incidence, and total termination for termination
* Ignore records with unknown incurred and issue ages, policy year, and issue year
* Define incidence rate as claim count over total exposure
* Define termination/death/benefit expiry/recovery rate as termination/death/benefit expiry/recovery over exposure
* If a question requires treating incurred age or issue age as numeric values, use the bucket ending age
* When asked about claim duration, covert it in years, rounded to the nearest integer
* Always sort incurred age, issue age, claim duration, policy year, issue year
* Define base incidence rate as the incidence rate by incurred age bucket and gender
